net.sf.JRecord.Common

Class FieldDetail

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.Common.FieldDetail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFieldDetail

    public class FieldDetail
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFieldDetail
    This class stores the description of one field in a record (or Line). It is used by the RecordDetail class 
         LayoutDetail  - Describes a file
       |
       +----- RecordDetail (1 or More) - Describes one record in the file
                |
                +------  FieldDetail (1 or More)  - Describes one field in the file
    Version:
    0.55
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

      Create a field definition
